mapper.insert: merge into cart_tbl using dual on (MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id} and PRO_NUM = #{pro_num}) when matched then update set CART_AMOUNT = CART_AMOUNT + #{cart_amount} when not matched then insert(cart_code, pro_num, mbsp_id, cart_amount) values(seq_cart_code.nextval,#{pro_num},#{mbsp_id},#{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT rownum num, c.cart_code, p.pro_up_folder, P.pro_img, p.pro_num, P.pro_name, P.pro_price, C.cart_amount , P.pro_price * C.cart_amount as unitprice FROM product_tbl p INNER JOIN cart_tbl c ON p.pro_num = c.pro_num WHERE c.MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
SELECT sum(P.pro_price * C.cart_amount) as cart_tot_price FROM product_tbl p INNER JOIN cart_tbl c ON p.pro_num = c.pro_num WHERE c.MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
